DOC.brief_title: Effects Expiratory Pressure Arterial Oxygenation During Hypoxia
DOC.detailed_description: Two type procedure test random order , interspaced rest period : threshold PEEP set 5,10 15 cm water purse leap breathing . Subjects test rest , light exercise ( 30 % sea level predict VO2max ) . FiO2 set 12.5 % ( 4000 ) . fc , VE , PETCO2 , TA , ECG , cardiac output , tissular oxygenation monitor .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : active ( > 2 hrs/week physical activity ) adult non smoking volunteer Exclusion Criteria : cardiac , respiratory , neuromuscular , metabolic pathology
